content:
Having completed high school with a strong foundation in computer science, my journey into the realm of programming began. I eagerly delved into the world of coding, initially focusing on Python and C.

As I immersed myself in these languages, my proficiency grew steadily, and I found myself increasingly captivated by the intricate art of programming. Beyond the mere acquisition of technical skills, I discovered a profound passion for problem-solving and creative expression through code.

This love for programming ignited a relentless drive to explore new horizons and embrace emerging technologies. With each project, whether it was developing web applications or crafting efficient algorithms, I felt a deep sense of fulfillment. My post-high school programming experience is not about boasting but rather a testament to my enduring dedication to this craft and my commitment to continual growth and innovation within the dynamic landscape of computer science.
title: Experience

content: not the best but still proud. was confusing ngl. but happy for the output.
title: Experience with Task
